data.name: treasure chest
data.description: Fortunes untold (potentially) await the lucky adventurer who finds one of these. Chests can often be found within shrines or at enemy camps, but there may be some crafty folks who think they're safer underground.

data.name: ore deposit
data.description: This deposit contains a good deal of ore. Breaking the rock will yield rock salt, flint, and other minerals of varying value.

data.name: rare ore deposit
data.description: This deposit contains a good deal of precious ore and the occasional rare mineral, like ruby and sapphire. Break it open to see what it has to offer!

data.name: luminous stone deposit
data.description: This deposit contains quite a bit of luminous stone. Crack it open to get at the easily process rocks within.

data.name: zonaite deposit
data.description: The deposit glows with mysterious energy and is very common in the Depths. If you crack it open, you can claim the zonaite within.

data.name: well
data.description: A hole dug in the earth to draw water from underground. Can be found in stables, towns, and sometimes even ruins. Home to a variety of unique fauna and flora.
